Posts.Title: A rad onc weighs in on radiation "burns" Spinnerpom 53nancy

Posts.Content: Aug 3, 2013 03:16PM susaninicking wrote: I do not know the answers to most of your questions but I have a mild form of epilepsy, have never had seizures since I started medication but had 5 in the first day after my first chemo. The culprit was one of the pre-medications. Is your aunt on any medication? Does she have epilepsy? Does the Dr. at rads know about the seizures? Does she have a neurologist? Here's a link for what to do during seizures www.webmd.com/epilepsy/tc/help... I have a few seconds warning and will do whatever it takes to get flat so I don't fall and crack my head open ( again!). Hope something here helps somehow.
Posts.Title: Seizures between radiotherapy Akanksha susaninicking
